values: Well I did it. I bought my first car today, it's a 95 Grand Am GT.  I really like it, it's silver and it's all mine! heh  My payments are like really reasonable and it's well worth it, so i'm all excited today.  It's funny b/c Jason just got a new car too, and they're almost identical, so we get to compare in good ways and not be jealous and stuff.  I'm going to the beach tomorrow to see some family...I have to go there to pick up some of my stuff from home anyways that they brough for me.  I had to work a double yesterday so i'm really tired, but hopefully i'll just be able to make it through tonight.  As Tonka said, and I really did prove this to myself today, "I dun changed over a new leaf".   hehe
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/11635.html

Well in case you didn't know, I threw out my back on Monday night. On Tuesday night I went to the ER, and I had a sprained back. I had alot of meds that night and I was put on three prescriptions. It was ok though b/c I had to take three days off of work, and tonight will be my first night back since the injury. Jason was absolutely wonderful...he took care of me with anything and everything I needed, and really put up with me being cranky too. The meds made my mood really unpredictable, and he just put up with it and was wonderful about it. My back still is sore, but much much better.  Just wanted to let everyone know that I was ok.  I'm going tomorrow to hopefully get a new car (a Nissan Altima hopefully).  I just don't know how the insurance and stuff is gonna work, but we shall soon see!!  *crosses fingers*
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/11443.html

Payday is always a good day. hehe  I'm just chillin watching Me Myself and Irene. I've been spending alot of time with an old friend lately, and it seems we're finally getting along. I hope it continues b/c it's a great feeling.  A few friends have returned to Greenville and i look forward to seeing them.  Nothing else going on really, just carefree and happy, without a care in the world.  Oh yeah, and I got a raise at work...as Ice Cube would say "Damn right it was a good day"
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/11118.html

i'm just chillin today. I changed my schedule a bit so i'm working an extra day this week, but only 5-11 today.  That's not so bad.  I have a friend coming to see me today which should be really cool. I made some jello shots, but i think i made em too strong. lol  They will be ready by the time i get home from work though. I just feel like it's one of those days, where i want to get trashed. sue me.  these things could kill a small horse i think. lol  oh well.  i'll just make sure kitty doesn't get into them. :-)
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/10775.html

So come on, I'm ready to hear it all...Ryan turned out to be a total asshole. Go figure. He never did anything bad, he just kinda disappeared. He wasn't honest with me and that's not acceptable. SO, that little venture is done. Oh well.  I got the new Goo Goo Dolls CD, it's a 22 track compilation off of all 6 of their cd's, with songs that weren't so popular. It's really good and i'm so excited that it's finally out!!  I went to La Vista's tonight to get some pizza and a drink, and I ended up having a few jello shots. lol I got a little tipsy I guess you could say, but i'm all good now.  I've recently been clicking well with somebody, but i'm just gonna take it at face value. I'm not going to get involved like i usually do because i'm afraid of being played again. Tuesday will tell alot though..
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/10636.html

Hey everyone!  Well it's been an eventful week for sure.  Things with Ryan are still progressing..he's arriving here on Sunday, for 2 days this time, so that should be awesome and i'm really looking forward to it. :)  I made up with a good friend of mine it seems...we talked for the first time in almost 3 months, and it's nice to be on civil terms again.  Jason's been kind of giving me shit lately, but that's to be expected. It goes with the territory. hehe  Tonight being my night off, i'm just gonna chill at home and listen to some music, maybe watch a movie as well. I have the whole house to myself and i'm just going to enjoy the peace and quiet!  To all of my friends, I miss you lots and continue to keep in touch! :-)
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/10242.html

OK i know it's been a long time since i've posted, but when something pretty major comes along I will make it a point to post.  Seeing as how I am writing right now (lol) get ready. Amber, sit down gurl!!! hehe   
Last weekend this guy in Greensboro IM'd me. Like all usual IM's from peeps I don't know, i blew him off. He was persistent though in a good way, not just wanting sex or the like. So we started talking, and actually got along. After a couple of phone calls and talking online for 6 hours at a time we decide to meet, so he makes the three hour drive last night to come to Greenville. I was working a 3-11 at the hotel and DAMN was I nervous. hehe  He arrived at about 10 and my god what a gorgeous gorgeous guy. He looked like he belonged in a GAP commercial or on Dawson's Creek, as my coworker Christina said. lol  We had a great night, walking through campus in the rain and watching Dogma.  I already knew I really liked his personality at this point, so with him being beautiful just added fuel to the fire. lol  I do not go into details, but I will say that somebody's in trouble b/c I have a hickey on my neck. heh  Things aren't official..yet, but I anticipate them being so fairly soon. The distance will bother me, but for somebody to sweep me off of my feet what's three measly hours?
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/10123.html

OKAY, I know i haven't posted in forever, but basically i've worried about other things. I'm in the process of moving, and though it's only down the street, it's still very expensive and very time consuming. There's so much to do and so little time to do it. I have 3 days left in my first apartment, and i'm sure going to miss it. I had so many good memories here, but oh well...life goes on.  I'm learning how to drive stick shift also at the moment. It's okay sometimes, but I have a hard time backing up and getting started. I'm borrowing a friends 5 speed so I can practice some, b/c I'm getting a new car in June and mom wants me to get a five speed. We shall see, but right now if I could just get it started every time I'd prefer a five speed for sure.  Saturday is my birthday, I turn 21. YES, I'm going to get fucked up. lol  I can't wait really.  Next week, while i'm in between apartments (i don't move into my new place until the following friday) i'm going to be staying with my aunt who lives in goldsboro. It's only like a 45 min drive to work, and I grew up there so it will be fun. Well kids I'm off to bed now, there's nothing more to say. Keep in touch guys! :)
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/9969.html

Hey strangers!  I've been way too busy to update my journal lately, but oh well. deal with it! haha  I spent all day yesterday with two good friends of mine whom i'm setting up.  They really like each other, so my mr. matchmaker attempt seems successful!  I went to the club last night just to see two friends perform, and they were both fabulous! They both won amateur night and last night was their first actual show. I was proud of both of them.  Today I went to go see Disney's new movie "Recess".  It was cute, and the one girl with bucked teeth was just too adorable! hehe  Spring Break is over and everybody except for Leigh-chan is back. My little break from everybody is over, but I'm glad that everybody is back. To Amber, it's okay. I don't blame you but I will call you tonight so that we can talk. :)  To Athena, I had so much fun last night hanging out with you, and hopefully we can get together some time this week. *s* Duke is in the Sweet 16, work is going okay, and my social life is finally real. Life is so great right now, and that's all I have to say about that!  I'll write more later, peace out!  BTW, Monday night is looking awesome. ;-)
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/9626.html

I haven't posted in a while but i've had nothing to write about really. I've been going to work, that's exciting. The highlight of my day today was watching Survivor, and I'm so fuckin mad that Alicia got kicked off. I will say one thing, Tina is a flatout bitch but I like her, and I think she's smart enough to win the cool million.  I do want to make one thing clear, and please keep in mind that this is NOT directed at anybody in particular. There are a few rumors going around. One of those rumors was proved untrue, the one about me fucking Jason while I was in another relationship. Still though, I keep hearing it. That dind't happen.  Rumor #2, everybody seems to think that I'm back with Jason. That also is not true. I will admit that we're actually getting along now, but we are not back together and quite frankly I don't think we ever will be. I just wanted to make that perfectly clear, I've let it go for a while but those assumptions are starting to really piss me off. Don't assume, it makes an ASS out of U and ME.  hehe A good friend once taught me that little saying.  I'm at a point in my life right now where i'm just gonna sit back and let things come to me. We'll see what happens, but hopefully the right things will come to me, as I expect them to.  Well i'll post again later.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/9250.html

I am better than to respond to people childishly "calling me out" on here. It did kind of shock me a little bit, I won't lie. I wouldn't so much say it hurt, b/c well I've come to expect nothing from that person. It did bother me though, and many people were also bothered by it. I'll let them do the talking, for I have nothing to say to or about him. (I have starred out their names b/c I don't like to start shit, i'm just proving a point)  :)

 * *******:	 you know you are cute..so dont listen to a word he says 

 ***********:	 there is no reason for him to tell everyone in the world your business 
 ***********:	 I think it is wrong 
 ***********:	 he is all about attention 
 ***********:	 and drama 

 ************:	 I think he is going out of his way to be shitty and the no attraction thing is bull crap, that is just him trying to play it off, he is so enraged with jelousy its not even funny dude 

 ************:	 that is because he is so immature 

 ********:	 I think that there are some valid feelings there.. I just don't particularly agree with posting them up like that 

 ***********:	 (I think you are way cuter than Phil.. I know ppl have different tastes.. but still) 

 ***** ********:	 honey--don't take it seriously 
 ***** ********:	 I'll be there for you no matter what 

 ***********:	 but he is showing everyone what an asshole he is 

 ********:	 but then again... he didn't have to be so... well mean/blunt about it 

*************:	 it is childish and funny 

OK, so obviously I look good and well since my personality seems to be more liked that some other people what does that say about him? LOL  they may call me mr. personality, but at least I have a personality.  :)  And, btw, who's the queen bitch now?  *kisses*
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/9142.html

I don't know what to think sometimes.  I had a good day today but it turned out really weird and kinda shitty towards the end. I have somebody I dont even know sleeping on my sofa and he has my pillows and blanket, and somebody who I care about is mad at me b/c he thinks this person is a trick. So this is my first of two days off, and i can't even be comfortable. oh well.  Everybody is either gone for spring break or leaving in the morning, and I couldn't be happier. It's like getting a week off, drama and stress free for once and it'll be nice for sure. It might get boring at times but oh well, i'll deal with that just fine. I have work and stuff, plus Kitty is awesome as hell and she's never once betrayed me. I love that black bitch.  LOL  I went to a get together upstairs about an hour ago, but nothing exciting was happening so I'm back here, and about to go to bed.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/8873.html

**************** [9:31 PM]:	 when did he leave?     
Sometimes people just wonder b/c they may have had plans or something to that effect, but it's not always about trust.  My pretty boy did come over, we just had a good heart to heart and things are left on terms of things being thought about, which i'm happy with. I just want a decision that's genuine, meaning both peoples' sides are heard and if he can't see that i'm genuine and if he doesnn't trust that i can fix those little things that were wrong, then that's not the boy that I grew to care for so much. We shall see where things end up, but as of right now they are being re-evaluated which I think is a good decision. Patience is a virtue.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/8490.html

I've thought long and hard about whether I should do this or not, and i've come to the conclusion that I must follow my heart, and do what I think is right.  I'm posting this for everybody to see, and maybe the person who this is addressed to will listen to every word I have to say and try to salvage something special.  Back in December I met somebody who completely swept me off of my feet, and I know I did the same for him. Ever since then we have become closer and closer, on many levels. I like everything about him, from the smell of strawberries n Phil to the dot on his lip to being another Pikachu and Luna.  Last Saturday a part of that ended when he broke up with me, for reasons which he might have been right about.  I'm not upset due to the fact that I totally turned my life around to date him, i'm just upset b/c I think that things were ended too abruptly.  I found out something on Sunday for the first time, without a chance to work on or correct it. I want Phil to know that I trust him with all my heart, and I believe deep down he knows that's true. Now, I want to prove that to him.  I'm making this offer in front of everybody, to show how much I care. We have plans tonight to watch Survivor, just like every Thursday night. I want another chance at this, I know that Phil would be happy with me and I would treat him great, I always did. The things that bugged him I will and have been working on, and if I mean it to him he will show up here tonight by 8pm, to open up to me so we can talk things out. I don't want any phone calls, any online conversations, I just want to wait here and see if he shows up or not. I know that he has nothing else to do b/c we already have plans together, so it's just a matter of if he wants this or not.  I want to prove to him that he's trusted, and he can't deny that smile on his face he always got.  I will be waiting here, and if he shows up I know that he trusts me to konw that i'm honest and sincere about this, and if not then maybe he's just not ready but I trust that I will see my pretty boy by 8pm. I will post later tonight to let you guys know what happened.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/8406.html

Well I'm about to go to bed, I just wanted to post before I slept all day. hehe  I've had alot better couple of days than was expected.  I'm really happy once again, and smiling. All of my friends seem happy, and that makes me happy too.  I saw a new Britney video this morning for one of my favorite songs of hers "Don't Let Me Be The Last To Know", and when I went to her concert that was my favorite performance.  I only have 2 days left this week of working in the ghetto. lol  I'm supposed to get a call back from the guy at Online today, so I'm hoping that'll go well, though I just left a message on his voicemail and *totally* botched it. lol  Not good when you're looking for a position that involves talking to customers. hehehe  oh well, i'm sure i'll be okay.  Until then though i'm gonna sleep!!  The fairfield's gonna call today too to set up an interview, so I need to sleep while I can. :)
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/8082.html

I made it home from my first night of working in the ghetto. It was so scary, omg. you have no idea! I got an unexpected phone call from a true friend last night, and that made my night totally.  An old coworker from the Ramada stopped by, and ended up staying until almost 5:30, so the night went by pretty quickly.  I got to go home a little bit early because the guy that hired me works first shift and he didn't really have anything else for me to do, he had to come down early to make sure I did everything right (which I did) so I could go home at like 6:30 this morning, lucky me!  I also found out that I wasn't stood up by my friend Jeremy, he just had some drama with his ex boyfriend who cheated on him so he ended up going and staying with a friend, which is totally understandable. Well I'm gonna wait for my job interview then go to bed!  Gnite everybody
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/7878.html

"i dreamt about another girl in bed with you, you just laughed and smiled, denied the proof.  we're fine til I think of the problem. I wish you made sense, like a joke that no one gets, it's a life without regrets, i wanted to feel that way forever and ever...When the morning comes, don't say you love me, don't say you need me, i really don't think that's fair. boy I'm not so dumb, but when you need me, I'll be wishing I was there. wishing I was there with you"   I have done nothing today. I was supposed to meet somebody for lunch but surprise surprise they never called.  go figure.  I hung out last night with my friend Amber til about 5. we watched scooby doo and just talked, it was cool b/c for a while I somewhat had my mind off of things. Last night I was just being supportive to my friend but in hindsight alot of things he said really pissed me off, royally. I still think the world of him though, and still consider him to be a great firend. I start my new job tonight at HoJo. I'm not looking forward to it at all but oh well, it's a paycheck until I can find something decent. Well i'm off peeps, PEACE!!  OH, and to my friends out there, you KNOW who you are, i'm on a friend level now. treat me like it.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/7471.html

I had the talk today that I was waiting for, and it went okay in a way and not so okay in another way. I'm really relieved that what I thought happened didn't, but i'm also frustrated b/c it seems that I was the one who wasn't so good. I really did try though, I really did, I guess it's just not in my nature to be good for him in a relationship. That's fine, I just really want my best friend back the way it was. I want to be there for him as a friend, like I was before. I will never, ever betray him, and will still do anything for him. And I am truly sorry for the emotions that I put him through and for making him think he had to go to such extremes. I take responsibility. I'm meeting somebody for lunch tomorrow, and i'm excited in a way but it's still kind of bittersweet. I'm just trying my best to move on and get on with my life. I've been through alot this past couple of months, but i also must remember that I've put some people through ALOT of stress and drama, so i can't complain.  I'm going to try to sleep now so that I can wake up before lunchtime. Fat chance of that, huh? LOL
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/7287.html

I hate myself lately. I'm letting others affect my happiness and plus i'm turning into a drama queen. I drank last night and I *never* do that, and I only did it b/c I was so bummed out. I'm so disappointed in myself for that. I start my new job tonight, but i don't care. there's one thing on my mind, everybody close to me knows what that is.  I was let down by 2 people today, both of them said they were gonna talk to me, one for support b/c i was down and the other to resolve a problem, both of them have apparently stood me up b/c I haven't heard from either of them. OH well, that's life I guess. A friend of mine I would like to say special thanks to, she's been with me through all of this and has helped me out more than she could ever imagine. You know who you are, thank you so very very much. I will be okay, I will be strong and I will make it!!  it's just the hardest part about all of this is the person who's support I want the most is not really here for me, though the circumstances, i still want him to be. we shall see.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/7024.html

of all the goddamn FUCKING people in this town who i could give my heart to, I fell for the boy who was the most trustworthy, the one who never does anything wrong, the virgin. I proved to everybody that J Hill is not all about sex, at all. I just want real love. Even still I was fucked over, i don't know how but i obviously was. If this boy, who I trust sooooo much can do me wrong, then anybody will. I just can't believe it. I really didn't expect it this time, not from him. I'm just a tore up ball of emotions right now so i probably shouldn't post this, but the "best friend" can make it all better, he has that power.  He's just choosing to not use that power, he did something wrong and I'm the one that's being nice and being yelled at.  Oh well, another chapter in my life as the drama queen.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/6737.html

OK so my boyfriend made some huge mistake that is obviously earth shattering. The biggest problem I have though is that he is also my best friend, but he's not treating me like it. He says that he wants to be friends, but he needs to prove that. He won't even talk to me. I am scared to talk to him, he yells alot lately and gets kinda bitchy because I want to know what's going on. He says it's in my hands but it's not. He needs to come to me, and show me what I mean. He needs to confide in me and trust me the way that he used to. I can look past the fact that I'm still deeply in love with him, because the friendship was always of upmost importance to me, and it still is. But if I am as good a friend as he is to me then he will trust in me and come to me, i fully expect that he will. Until then, i'm just gonna be the welcome mat that i've grown accustomed to.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/6585.html

so my boyfriend dumped me tonight, and I did nothing wrong. How nice. Well, apparently he kissed a friend of ours, at least that's what I was told, so my worst fears had come true. I went to a party upstairs and got drunk, and I regret it now b/c it only intensifies yourfeelings, so now i'm even more depressed. While I was there, it was my turn. I went straight to the source. This person said that it was totally not true, and it didn't happen.  Well that makes me even more confused.WHAT THE FUCK IS GOING ON??  I thought I finally had somebody who would do me right, why must I keep getting hurt?  I'm not a bad guy, i don't deserve this.  I need to find out exactly what went on, and what's going on.  I have to know for my own well being. Nobody else is going to do this for me, they don't care enough. I have to find out on my own, I need to make this happen all by myself.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/6267.html

I woke up today and still heard nothing, so I decided to take matters into my own hands. I'm getting an answer today, and no longer am I afraid of getting an answer I don'tw ant to hear. See, either way I will know exactly what's going on, and that has to be better than this.  All my friends are there for me, which is great, so at least I'm not going through this alone, but it's still such a lonely and depressing feeling.  I'll post later when everything is found out, but until now it's time to play the ever so fun waiting game
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/5986.html

I was done wrong tonight.  Stood up, for the second time in as many nights. What makes it worse is that the person who did this supposedly puts me first, and god knows I put them first.  I haven't really slept well since about 3 nights ago, and tonight will surely be no different.  I just hope this person realizes what they're doing, and maybe things will all be better tomorrow, but I heard from 6, count them 6, different people tonight that my boyfriend was breaking up with me. they certainly didn't hear that from me since I didn't even go out.  Oh well, we'll see what happens I guess. It's out of my hands, I've done nothing wrong and this situation can easily be fixed, it's just up to that person whether they want to or not.  now i'm going to attempt something called sleep.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/5730.html

today is officially one month, and it's weird b/c today was the day that the apartment became really *mine*.  All of my old roommates furniture and shit is gone, so it's all Jon.  It seems that at the one month marker things really became official, i guess it was a trial period or something. lol  I had a rough night last night, hardly sleeping a wink. I'm worried about all my bills and what not, and thank god I got this new job or else I'd be having panic attacks 24/7.  Tonight i'm just gonna try to not worry about anything and have a good time.  i've been busy cleaning and decorating all day and I deserve a fun night out for sure.  I still have alot of work to do, but it's coming along nicely!
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/5586.html

Wow, I am sooo unbelievable proud of myself. I was out of work for a total of 18 hours. I got hired today at the Howard Johnson, full time audit position Sunday-Thursday nights.  I still get my club nights and I start actually on Sunday, which is awesome. I made it. The odds were stacked agains me and I beat them. I could've taken the easy road out, but that would not be being true to myself or my heart. I decided to go for what I had, to follow my heart and take the chance. It was worth it. It would've been worth it either way. I'm so happy with my life right now, and I think this was a test. It was a test to see how serious I was with what I have and how much I care. I passed the test, and I'm so proud of myself. OH, and another thing, one of my best friends Tonka from the Ramada just got hired there too, so I will be working with her once again. :)  Nothing can stop me now, nothing can stop us now.
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/5237.html

Yes, I'm still awake. I got showered and all prettied up and went out to get a paper. I called this place called On-line, which is right near where I live, and they're looking for a telephone collection-agent, which is basically somebody who calls you when you don't make your car payments and stuff, and we threaten you, etc.  It's got a base salary but also commissions on your collections, and they like the experience that I have so hopefully this will work out.  The guy is going to call me back here really soon, so all of you who have faith in me maybe i won't let you down after all. Cross your fingers!! "I'm a survivor, I'm not gonna give up, I'm not gonna stop, I'm gonna work harder. I'm a survivor, I'm gonna make it"
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/4887.html

OK, so I went to work tonight just to get fired. Gillian, one of my best friends at work, fired me because I wasn't a "team player".  After getting fired, I went to BW3 and my friend Jimmie was there, along with my ex Jason and my boyfriend. All of them were there for me, and so was Cliff (my upstairs neighbor). I think that I will be OK, i'm a very strong person and I know that I can make it!  I'm just so mad, b/c this was so out of the blue and unexpected, and I feel like i've done a really good job there, I've even had 2 promotions in the past month. Oh well, speaking of months late tonight/early tomorrow morning it will be one month officially. A big part of me can't believe that we've made it this far, but the first month is always the toughest, and we have been through one really big tester, so it looks like smooth sailing from here, and it's all good.  And today I'm just gonna stay up and get out early looking for a job so that I can take good care of myself and my kitty, and get ready for survivor night. I really hope that Alicia is gonna be okay, but I ahve a bad feeling that she's the one that gets hurt.  I guess we'll see tonight. Anybody out there, wish me luck and stuff, I have confidence in myself but this is SO hard and scary!!
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/4670.html

Wow, as if my day wasn't already going great, I got surprised at work tonight by my boyfriend and a friend of ours, Jen.  As I wrote earlier I was worried about the night dragging ass really bad because I got done so early, but that just totally made my night. They were in the area, going to wal mart to pick up sugar and caffeine for all-nighters they had to pull for art projects.  I like little surprises like that, most people just can't comprehend how much I value that.  Right now I only have less than 2 hours of work left, then I get to go home and go to bed!!! :)  I'm gonna sleep so good today, b/c it's kind of cold outside and it's gonna be rainy (hopefully).  Well, I guess I don't really have anything else to say tonight, but i'll be back later to update, unlike some other slackers. :D
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/4533.html

I'm sitting here at work and I'm done with everything!  that means I bascially have 6 hours to kill, be that by talking online and eating. lol  I'm thinking about getting some takeout from across the street, b/c some cajun chicken and mashed potatoes sounds really good right about now. This will be the second time I went to Perkin's today, earlier I had some strawberry pancakes with Phil and Elena. Wehn I was there earlier though I was *not* in a good mood at all. I'm feeling better now though, I got to see alot of friends today that I havent' seen in a while (Rachel, Athena, Linzi) and got to meet some new people, which I'm always up for.  Now hopefully the night won't drag ass too bad. lol  And I found out that I get my new furniture on Thursday, so i'm really looking forward to that. OH, and will somebody PLEASE remind me today to go appeal my parking ticket??  hehe  I'm outta here, PEACE!
http://ecugustavo.livejournal.com/4112.html

I had a really good day today. I spoke to my aunt for the first time in a long time. even though she lives about 30 minutes from me, we haven't spoke since right after I moved down here. Me and her are on really good terms now, which pleases me. I hung out with Leigh-chan for a little while today, and she has the greatest game for Dreamcast, called "Crazy Taxi".  It's so awesome, you get to drive like a maniac to get people to their stops and stuff, and it's measured on how much cab fare you earn.  What an awesome and original idea!! It's so funny how life works sometimes. I don't mean funny in a comical way, but rather in an ironic way.
